content.editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个11岁的小女孩准备横渡英吉利海峡的故事。课文使用了多种表示将来的时态结构，同时介绍了一些重要的语法点，如'be sure to do'和'watch, look at, follow'的区别等。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
dialogue: Debbie Hart is going to swim across the English Channel tomorrow.
She is going to set out from the French coast at five o'clock in the morning.
Debbie is only eleven years old and she hopes to set up a new world record.
She is a strong swimmer and many people feel that she is sure to succeed.
Debbie's father will set out with her in a small boat.
Mr. Hart has trained his daughter for years.
Tomorrow he will be watching her anxiously as she swims the long distance to England.
Debbie intends to take short rests every two hours.
She will have something to drink but she will not eat any solid food.
Most of Debbie's school friends will be waiting for her on the English coast.
Among them will be Debbie's mother, who swam the Channel herself when she was a girl.

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 黛比·哈特准备明天横渡英吉利海峡。
她打算早上5点钟从法国海岸出发。
黛比只有11岁，她希望创一项新的世界纪录。
她是一个游泳能手，很多人认为她一定能成功。
黛比的父亲将乘一条小船同她一道出发。
哈特先生训练她的女儿已经多年了。
明天他将焦急地注视着女儿游过这段漫长的距离到达英国。
黛比计划每两小时休息一下。
她将喝些饮料，但不吃固体食物。
黛比的大部分同学将在英国海岸等候她。
他们当中还会有黛比的母亲，她本人还是个姑娘时，也曾横渡过英吉利海峡！

newwords.heading: New words and expressions 生词和短语

notes.title: 表示将来的结构
content: 本课出现了多种表示将来的结构：
be going to do: 表示计划或打算，如 She is going to swim across the Channel
will be doing: 将来进行时，表示将来某时正在进行的动作，如 he will be watching her anxiously
intend to do: 打算做某事，如 Debbie intends to take short rests

notes.title: be sure to do结构
content: be sure to do表示'一定会'，比must更有把握
例句：She is sure to succeed
相关用法：be sure of sth.(对某事有把握)，be sure that...(对某人做某事有把握)

notes.title: 倒装句
content: 地点状语提前时，可以用倒装句
例句：Among them will be Debbie's mother
正常语序应为：Debbie's mother will be among them

notes.title: 非限定性定语从句
content: 用逗号隔开的定语从句是非限定性定语从句，起补充说明作用
例句：Among them will be Debbie's mother, who swam the Channel herself
非限定性定语从句不能用that引导

notes.example: She is going to set out from the French coast.
She hopes to set up a new world record.
Debbie intends to take short rests every two hours.

notes.context: 表示有可以饮用/食用的东西
notes.example: She will have something to drink but she will not eat any solid food.

multipleChoice.question: How old is Debbie Hart?
multipleChoice.explanation: 课文中明确提到Debbie is only eleven years old.

multipleChoice.question: What time will Debbie start her swim?
options: At four o'clock in the morning
At five o'clock in the morning
At six o'clock in the morning
At seven o'clock in the morning
multipleChoice.explanation: 课文提到She is going to set out from the French coast at five o'clock in the morning.

multipleChoice.question: How often will Debbie take a rest?
multipleChoice.explanation: 课文提到Debbie intends to take short rests every two hours.

fillInBlanks.sentence: Debbie's father will _____ out with her in a small boat.
She will have something to drink but she will not eat any _____ food.

notes.title: 词语辨析
notes.content: Watch, Look at, Follow的区别：watch表示观看正在发生的事情；look at表示仔细看；follow除了表示跟随，有时也可表示用目光跟随。

notes.title: 语言特点
notes.content: 本课使用了多种表示将来的句式，生动地描述了一个即将发生的挑战性事件。同时也展示了英语中表达计划、打算的多样化表达方式。

notes.title: 文化背景
notes.content: 横渡英吉利海峡是一项具有挑战性的体育活动，需要极强的体力和意志力。这种挑战在英语国家受到高度重视，创造记录更是一种激励人心的成就。
